name: The Revenant's Hunt
description: Forest chase. Revenant with bone-iron half mask (teeth like nails) behind Kassim. Cat hisses on Naia's arm. Maliya casts two salt circles. Eight tree scars. Mask gleam once. Riddle: When hunger wears a face, count the wounds in the trees.
prompt: Etched parchment engraved map-card, muted sepia + indigo + teal + faint gold highlights. Ritual haunting atmosphere, layered symbolic composition. Forest chase. Revenant with bone-iron half mask (teeth like nails) behind Kassim. Cat hisses on Naia's arm. Maliya casts two salt circles. Eight tree scars. Mask gleam once.. Key props numeric: 8 scars, 1 maskGleam, 2 saltCircles. Cipher letter: S Bearing: 100°. Intricate line engraving, subtle volumetric mist, painterly etched hybrid
